title: Can I get a fact check?
body:
Excuse me if I'm wrong but isn't this our first illustration of Boram Darkwill? 
(I think even the first for a significant NPC)
https://i.imgur.com/653yZIy.png

Unfortunately it's not a profile shot, so fingers cross for one.

Also Eric Canete's work is as baller as it always is.

replies.body: I was just amazed that no one spotted this sooner. :-D
Riven on that armor also looks a lot cooler than her current outfit

Between that and the awesome Irelia woodcarving teaser video, I think we can assume that Riven is reduced to about 10% of her original military armor... :-)

One of the things I wanted to make clear with all these lore updates, is that she's not just "a cheerleader with a sword" - she's a hardened military veteran, who's seen horrendous things, and definitely suffering psychologically for it. Also, I always imagined she'd be a lot more muscular than her splash/game model.

(Also-also, we just had to point out the fact that she wears bandages pretty much all of the time. Who even knows what those wounds must look like from the alchemical weapons attack...?)

I mean, it's nice that you're getting into all that but nothing you say or change is going to stop me or a lot of other people from waifuing Riven. If it comes out that she's horrifically scarred or disfigured I'll be annoyed but just put it out of my mental model and forget about it really.

She can be a psychologically damaged and recovering women with a broken spirit and plenty of other issues and questionable decisions in the past, but the Rule of Cute still holds true. [Beauty Equals Goodness](http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/BeautyEqualsGoodness) is a conventionally popular trope for a reason.
Beauty equals Goodness is fucking overused and boring imo.
....Noxus Riven where she's in full battle Armour wen?
isn't this basicly Crimson Elite riven?
No see Crimson elite Riven is part of the pre-retcon elite Noxian strike force, the Riven in the picture is wearing battle Armour more akin to Darius's
hopefully once you start ramping up visual updates (I know it will take a long time to happen) you can reflect all of these cool lore modernizations in the game through VO and model updates
Oh I did as soon as I saw it. I've invested too much time on Boram not to notice something so significant. Its just when you released this update, it would've been like 3am down here.

Yes, I think this is the first image of Boram Darkwill.

Not sure how many other "major" NPCs there really are. Jarvan III, probably, but I have no idea who else.

Well there is also Rafen,Miss fortunes second in command.

He might not be a major player in the overall world,but he is more significant than most other NPCs.
Rafen's not bad, you're right. He's one of the two NPCs to be IN two short stories, the other being Tamara (and she didn't do much in _Blood of Noxus_).
J3 art would be cool. All we have is a quick sketch from JoJ that’s not canon any more and wasn’t put much effort into it to be honest.
Now if we can just get a good look at the Ruined King, I think we'll be all set.
Also the women next to him might be Leblanc

Yes! that was a nice surprise!

We need more illustrations of NPCs.

Jarvan III, Iceborn sisters,Elder Souma,Lestara buvelle, Jax during his time in "where Icathia once stood", Kahina ... who else?
